77204.summary: Some customers in the Kitsilano area of Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
77204.title: May 25 - Vancouver (Kitsilano) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

77206.summary: Some customers in the Lynn Valley area of North Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
77206.title: May 25 - North Vancouver (Lynn Valley) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
